Package ohos.agp.text

Class BidiAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.text.BidiAnalyzer

  • public class BidiAnalyzer
extends Object
    Identifies the text direction based on the BidiStrategy specified by the user.
    Since:
    7

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  BidiAnalyzer.BidiRun
      Stores the division of internal text directions of a section.
      static class  BidiAnalyzer.BidiStrategy
      Enumerates the bidirectional text recognition strategies.

      static boolean getBidiRuns​(BidiAnalyzer.BidiStrategy strategy, CharSequence text, List<BidiAnalyzer.BidiRun> runs)
      Checks whether the general direction of text is RTL based on the specified strategy, and saves the direction division result to the runs list.
      static boolean getBidiRuns​(BidiAnalyzer.BidiStrategy strategy, CharSequence text, List<BidiAnalyzer.BidiRun> runs, String locale)
      Checks whether the general direction of text is RTL based on the specified strategy and locale, and saves the direction division result to the runs list.

      Checks whether the general direction of text is RTL based on the specified strategy and the Locale configured in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • isRtl

        public static boolean isRtl​(BidiAnalyzer.BidiStrategy strategy,
                            CharSequence text)
        Checks whether the general direction of text is RTL based on the specified strategy and the Locale configured in the system.
        Parameters:
        strategy - Indicates the bidirectional text recognition strategy.
        text - Indicates the text to be recognized.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the general direction of text is RTL; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a specified parameter is empty.
        Since:
        7

      • isRtl

        public static boolean isRtl​(BidiAnalyzer.BidiStrategy strategy,
                            CharSequence text,
                            String locale)
        Checks whether the general direction of text is RTL based on the specified strategy and locale.

        Ensure that locale is a valid locale ID.

        Parameters:
        strategy - Indicates the bidirectional text recognition strategy.
        text - Indicates the text to be recognized.
        locale - Indicates the locale ID.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the general direction of text is RTL; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a specified parameter is empty.
        Since:
        7

      • getBidiRuns

        public static boolean getBidiRuns​(BidiAnalyzer.BidiStrategy strategy,
                                  CharSequence text,
                                  List<BidiAnalyzer.BidiRun> runs)
        Checks whether the general direction of text is RTL based on the specified strategy, and saves the direction division result to the runs list.
        Parameters:
        strategy - Indicates the bidirectional text recognition strategy.
        text - Indicates the text to be recognized.
        runs - Indicates a list of the direction division result.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the general direction of text is RTL; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a specified parameter is empty.
        Since:
        7

      • getBidiRuns

        public static boolean getBidiRuns​(BidiAnalyzer.BidiStrategy strategy,
                                  CharSequence text,
                                  List<BidiAnalyzer.BidiRun> runs,
                                  String locale)
        Checks whether the general direction of text is RTL based on the specified strategy and locale, and saves the direction division result to the runs list.
        Parameters:
        strategy - Indicates the bidirectional text recognition strategy.
        text - Indicates the text to be recognized.
        runs - Indicates a list of the direction division result.
        locale - Indicates the locale ID.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the general direction of text is RTL; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a specified parameter is empty.
        Since:
        7
